alert.note: Alert for Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 3:33PM MDT until June 06 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Otero County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 333 PM MDT, a rapidly developing severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Rocky Ford, or 16 miles west of La Junta, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... La Junta, North La Junta, Rocky Ford, Swink, Cheraw, Higbee and Timpas. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
